resources.string: This certificate could not be read. More information about this error can be found in the message at the top of the screen.\n \n You should inform the individual about this error and prompt them for an alternative method of proof.

This certificate was scanned correctly and represents a valid proof of vaccination or test.
 
 This means that:
 - the issuing institution is recognised by the EU and has used a valid signing key
 - the certificate is still valid at this moment in time
 
 To ascertain that the holder of this certificate matches the person in front of you, please ask them for an identity document such as a passport or driving licence.
